definition: common plea/civil appeal (as opposed to criminal case)

sentences.english: Objection to the jurisdiction is an important component of the jurisdiction system of civil litigation.
sentences.chinese: 管轄權異議制度是民事訴訟管轄制度的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: The indicting condition of civil lawsuit is exact in our country.
sentences.chinese: 我國民事訴訟的起訴條件比較嚴格，對當事人不公平。

sentences.english: Not-suing is an important instition of our country's criminal suit law.
sentences.chinese: 不起訴是我國刑事訴訟法的一項重要制度。

sentences.english: Writ system is a widely adopted pretrial criminal procedure in western courtiers which is based on the indep.
sentences.chinese: 刑事訴訟審前程序是我國刑事訴訟的重要環節。

sentences.english: Writ system is a widely adopted pretrial criminal procedure in western courtiers which is based on the indep.
sentences.chinese: 刑事訴訟審前程序是我國刑事訴訟的重要環節。

sentences.english: The third chapter is about the malicious actions of tort factor in theory.
sentences.chinese: 第三章是關於惡意訴訟侵權行爲構成要件的理論探討。

sentences.english: Criminal laws stipulate that detention de bene esse can apply to active criminal.
sentences.chinese: 刑事訴訟法規定對現行犯可以適用先行拘留。

sentences.english: Retirement accounts and savings, they say, have been drained to pay legal fees.
sentences.chinese: 用來支付訴訟費用的退休金賬戶和儲蓄已被耗盡。

sentences.english: The civil supervising system is a newly-born litigation system.
sentences.chinese: 人民監督員制度是一個訴訟過程中出現的新訴訟制度。

sentences.english: The civil supervising system is a newly-born litigation system.
sentences.chinese: 人民監督員制度是一個訴訟過程中出現的新訴訟制度。

sentences.english: The principle of orality is established as a basic principle in modern civil Procedural law.
sentences.chinese: 言詞原則是近代民事訴訟法確立的一項重要原則。

sentences.english: For me, the proceedings were not ending, but just beginning.
sentences.chinese: 對我來說，訴訟程序沒有結束，才只是剛剛開始。

sentences.english: the carrier against whom an action has been brought shall have the right to require the other carrier to join in the proceedings.
sentences.chinese: 被提起訴訟的承運人有權要求另一承運人蔘加應訴。

sentences.english: This part tells us the values and function of the pre-court procedure.
sentences.chinese: 該部分介紹了民事訴訟審前準備的價值和功能。

sentences.english: He invested his lawyer with complete power to act for him.
sentences.chinese: 他授權律師全權代他訴訟。

sentences.english: The litigation right of the accused is the principal part and core of guaranteeing human rights.
sentences.chinese: 刑事被訴人的訴訟權利是人權保障的主體和核心。

definition: judgment (by a court of law)/to pass judgment on/to sentence
persons involved or implicated/party (to an affair)
to sue/to bring a lawsuit against/to prosecute
to consult with/to talk things over/agreement
to demand payment of money owing
